step_feedback.feedback: Your arm was mostly straight overhead, but could be a little straighter. Keep reaching up!
Your fist was good, but try to tighten your muscles a bit more as you make the fist.
Your hand was open, but try to spread your fingers wider to feel more resistance.
Your hand opened well, and your muscles relaxed nicely. Keep visualizing that fluid moving!

exercise_summary: Great job with the overhead pumping! Try to stretch your arm a bit straighter overhead and make your fist tighter. Remember to open your fingers wide and relax fully on the exhale.
